effect.name: Crystalizer
effect.description: Simple algorithm for audio noise sharpening. This filter linearly increases differences betweeen each audio sample.
effect.author: libavfilter

parameter.name: av.i
Intensity
parameter.comment: Sets the intensity of effect (default: 2.0). Must be in range between -10.0 to 0 (unchanged sound) to 10.0 (maximum effect). To inverse filtering use negative value.
